api/MicroWrath.Deferred.IDeferred-1.html.title: Interface IDeferred<A> | MicroWrath
api/MicroWrath.Deferred.IDeferred-1.html.keywords: Interface IDeferred<A> Namespace MicroWrath.Deferred Assembly MicroWrath.dll Deferred execution context returning A. A deferred context is a function or collection of functions whose execution can be invoked at a later time. The return value may be memoized ie. execution of Eval() only invokes the underlying function once. In addition, this evaluation is also an IObservable<T> event source. These contexts may be chained or combined to construct a deferrred "pipeline".
